name: Amanita (rushork)
description:
Welcome to Amanita a game made by Rushork for the #stopwaitingforgodot GameJam over a few days.

You play as a Halfling that has gone out into the local forest to harvest some mushrooms before the night comes and the monsters come out. How many can you collect before time runs out?

Controls:

Movement Keys - WASD

Walk over the mushrooms to collect them

All assets are made by Rushork, apart from the walking noise (www.fesliyanstudios.com)
